hero.text: Your comprehensive platform for analyzing and understanding the Macedonian Stock Exchange market. Get real-time insights, advanced analytics, and make informed investment decisions.

issuers_data.title: Issuers Data
issuers_data.content: Access detailed and historical stock performance data for listed Macedonian companies, including price changes, trading volume, and key financial statistics.

visualization.title: Visualization
visualization.content: Explore visual insights through interactive charts and graphs to better understand stock performance, historical trends, and market fluctuations over different timeframes.

technical.title: Technical Analysis
technical.content: Dive deep into market behavior using advanced technical indicators such as moving averages and oscillators tools to better understand potential future price movements

fundamental.title: Fundamental Analysis
fundamental.content: Evaluate company performance by analyzing news articles, economic indicators, and company announcements to generate long-term investment insights.

prediction.title: Prediction
prediction.content: Leverage LSTM-based machine learning models to generate intelligent forecasts of future stock price movements based on historical data patterns and trends.

fundamental.title: Fundamental Analysis
fundamental.news_no_content: No detailed content is available for this news article at the moment. However, you can check the attached files for more information.

sentiment.positive: The sentiment analysis conducted yielded a positive outlook, suggesting a recommendation to consider buying shares of this issuer.
sentiment.negative: After reviewing recent information, the sentiment analysis is negative, which indicates a recommendation to consider selling or avoiding additional investment at this time.
sentiment.neutral: The sentiment analysis is neutral, reflecting balanced perspectives in the available information and implying a recommendation to hold current positions without making significant changes.
sentiment.no_news: Currently, there are no recent news articles available. As a result, it is not possible to perform a reliable sentiment analysis at this time.
sentiment.note: Note: There may be news articles available for the issuer, but they contain only attachments without any textual content.

footer.text: Your comprehensive platform for market analysis and financial insights. Empowering investors with data-driven decisions.
